snippet.title: Rio 2016: WADA chief warns Brazil over Olympic construction delays
snippet.description:
* Conducting effective drug testing on site at the 2016 Olympic Games will be hard to implement if construction delays in Rio de Janeiro continue, the head of the World Anti-Doping Agency (WADA) has warned.
http://www.cnn.com/2014/04/18/sport/rio-2016-drug-testing-wada/index.html

snippet.title: 10 things you didn't know about Las Vegas

snippet.title: Study: 'Jesus' wife' fragment not a fake
snippet.description:
* By Daniel Burke, CNN Belief Blog Co-Editor (CNN) – A team of scientists has concluded that a controversial scrap of papyrus that purportedly quotes Jesus referring to "my wife," is not a fake, according to the Harvard Theological Review. "A wide range...
http://religion.blogs.cnn.com/2014/04/10/study-jesus-wife-fragment-not-a-fake/

snippet.title: Bubba Watson leads Masters at halfway stage
snippet.description:
* Bubba Watson will take a three-shot lead heading into the final two rounds of the Masters at Augusta National after firing a four-under par 68 on Friday.
http://www.cnn.com/2014/04/11/sport/golf/golf-masters-bubba-watson/index.html

snippet.title: 'Genius hour': What kids can learn from failure
snippet.description:
* When snow days piled up this winter, seventh-grader Emily Born was upset. It wasn't that she always loved school, or that she had a big test coming up and needed her teacher's help. No, the student from Thomas Middle School in Arlington Heights, Illinois, was sad to miss out on her "genius hour....
http://www.cnn.com/2014/03/09/living/genius-hour-education-schools/index.html

snippet.title: Former Boston mayor battling cancer
snippet.description:
* Washington (CNN) - A report revealed late Saturday evening Boston's longtime former mayor, Thomas Menino, has been diagnosed with an advanced form of cancer. In an extensive interview with the Boston Globe's Brian McGrory and Andrew Ryan, Menino, who...
http://politicalticker.blogs.cnn.com/2014/03/16/former-boston-mayor-battling-cancer/

snippet.title: FDA: Use HPV tests over Pap tests to find cervical cancer
snippet.description:

snippet.description:
